Note: Or /x/ (preferred pronunciation in Globasa and Lidepla)
Optional sound, may be pronounced /n/; /ŋg/ or /ng/ before vowels, ‘l’, and ‘r’.
Lidepla allows any kind of rhotic.
Written ‘u’ between a consonant and a vowel.
Written ‘i’ between a consonant and a vowel; pronounced as unstressed /i/ in Lidepla.
Optional sound, may be pronounced /s/; the preferred pronunciation in Lidepla is actually /dz/.
